level.text: 537.1 Each educational institution shall maintain the following records forvery instructor:
Copies of documents verifying the instructor’s past educational experience,ncluding:
A copy of the instructor’s certification in a related discipline;
A copy of the current District Instructor certification;
Documentation used by the agency to assess and authorize the Continuingducation instructors to teach each category (if applicable); and
537.2 An instructor shall be evaluated in the classroom environment duringis or her didactic evaluations.
537.3 An instructor may be evaluated in the classroom or field environmenturing his or her practical teaching evaluations.
537.4 The Director may conduct an audit or evaluation of an instructor’secords at any time, with or without prior notice.
537.5 An instructor certification shall be concurrent with the sponsoring EMSducational institution’s or the Emergency Medical Services Agency’sertification period.
